languages.text: "Тамошние проповедники много говорили о важности труда и единстве рабочего коллектива как семьи, но мало о значимости порядка и иерархии. Они давали прихожанам простую веру, дешевую, удобную и функциональную, как рабочая роба. И теперь им кажется, что утопающие в роскоши клирики желают ее отобрать".

"The preachers there have been preaching much about the importance of work and the labour community's familial unity, but they mention very little about the importance of order and hierarchy. They have granted their congregation a form of faith that is as simple, cheap, convenient, and functional as their work clothes. And now they seem to think that the priests, who are swimming in luxury, want to take this away from them."
languages.original_text: "Тамошние проповедники много говорили о важности труда и единстве рабочего коллектива как семьи, но мало о значимости порядка и иерархии. Они давали прихожанам простую веру, дешевую, удобную и функциональную, как рабочая роба. И теперь им кажется, что утопающие в роскоши клирики желают ее отобрать".

traits.locale_text: "The preachers there have been talking about the importance of work and the family-like unity of the working community a lot, but little about the importance of order and hierarchy. They have granted their congregation the faith that is as simple, cheap, convenient and functional, as the working clothes. And now they seem to think that the priests, who are swimming in luxury, want to take it away from them."

"The preachers there have been talking about the importance of work and the family-like unity of the working community a lot, but little about the importance of order and hierarchy. They have granted their congregation the faith that is as simple, cheap, convenient and functional, as the working clothes. And now they seem to think that the priests, who are swimming in luxury, want to take it away from them."

"The preachers there have been preaching much about the importance of work and the labour community's familial unity, but they mention very little about the importance of order and hierarchy. They have granted their congregation a form of faith that is as simple, cheap, convenient, and functional as their work clothes. And now they seem to think that the priests, who are swimming in luxury, want to take this away from them."

"The preachers there have been preaching much about the importance of work and the labour community's familial unity, but they mention very little about the importance of order and hierarchy. They have granted their congregation a form of faith that is as simple, cheap, convenient, and functional as their work clothes. And now they seem to think that the priests, who are swimming in luxury, want to take this away from them."

"The preachers there have been preaching much about the importance of work and the labour community's familial unity, but they mention very little about the importance of order and hierarchy. They have granted their congregation a form of faith that is as simple, cheap, convenient, and functional as their work clothes. And now they seem to think that the priests, who are swimming in luxury, want to take this away from them."

languages.text: “他们原本的布道士一直在宣扬工作的重要性，宣扬劳工社区内的家庭团结，很少提及秩序与等级制度的重要性。他们为当地信徒提供的教义，就像那些工人的工作服一样简单、廉价、方便、实用。现在，那些工人似乎认为，那些侯服玉食的国教牧师想从他们手中夺走这一切。”
languages.original_text: "The preachers there have been preaching much about the importance of work and the labour community's familial unity, but they mention very little about the importance of order and hierarchy. They have granted their congregation a form of faith that is as simple, cheap, convenient, and functional as their work clothes. And now they seem to think that the priests, who are swimming in luxury, want to take this away from them."

traits.locale_text: “他们原本的布道士一直在宣扬工作的重要性，宣扬劳工社区内的家庭团结，很少提及秩序与等级制度的重要性。他们为当地信徒提供的教义，就像那些工人的工作服一样简单、廉价、方便、实用。现在，那些工人似乎认为，那些侯服玉食的国教牧师想从他们手中夺走这一切。”

languages.text: «Los predicadores de allí han hablado mucho de la importancia del trabajo y de la unidad familiar de la comunidad laboral, pero mencionan muy poco la importancia del orden y la jerarquía. Han concedido a sus fieles una forma de fe tan sencilla, barata, cómoda y funcional como su ropa de trabajo. Y ahora parecen pensar que los sacerdotes, que nadan en opulencia, quieren arrebatárselo».
languages.original_text: "The preachers there have been preaching much about the importance of work and the labour community's familial unity, but they mention very little about the importance of order and hierarchy. They have granted their congregation a form of faith that is as simple, cheap, convenient, and functional as their work clothes. And now they seem to think that the priests, who are swimming in luxury, want to take this away from them."

traits.locale_text: «Los predicadores de allí han hablado mucho de la importancia del trabajo y de la unidad familiar de la comunidad laboral, pero mencionan muy poco la importancia del orden y la jerarquía. Han concedido a sus fieles una forma de fe tan sencilla, barata, cómoda y funcional como su ropa de trabajo. Y ahora parecen pensar que los sacerdotes, que nadan en opulencia, quieren arrebatárselo».

languages.text: 「そこにいるプリーチャーらは、仕事の重要性や労働コミュニティでの家族的結束について多くを説いていますが、秩序やヒエラルキーの重要性についてはほとんど触れていません。信徒たちに、作業着と同じようにシンプルで、安く、便利で、機能的な信仰の形態を与えました。そして、今、彼らは、ぜいたくに生活している司祭たちが、自分たちからそれを奪おうとしていると思っているようですね」
languages.original_text: "The preachers there have been preaching much about the importance of work and the labour community's familial unity, but they mention very little about the importance of order and hierarchy. They have granted their congregation a form of faith that is as simple, cheap, convenient, and functional as their work clothes. And now they seem to think that the priests, who are swimming in luxury, want to take this away from them."

traits.locale_text: 「そこにいるプリーチャーらは、仕事の重要性や労働コミュニティでの家族的結束について多くを説いていますが、秩序やヒエラルキーの重要性についてはほとんど触れていません。信徒たちに、作業着と同じようにシンプルで、安く、便利で、機能的な信仰の形態を与えました。そして、今、彼らは、ぜいたくに生活している司祭たちが、自分たちからそれを奪おうとしていると思っているようですね」

languages.text: « Là-bas, les prêtres prêchaient l'importance de l'unité familiale autour du travail communautaire, mais peu celle de l'ordre et de la hiérarchie. Ils ont apporté à leur congrégation une forme de foi simple, peu onéreuse, pratique et fonctionnelle, à l'image de leurs tenues de travail. Désormais, ils semblent penser que les prêtres, qui se vautrent dans le luxe, veulent la leur enlever. »
languages.original_text: "The preachers there have been preaching much about the importance of work and the labour community's familial unity, but they mention very little about the importance of order and hierarchy. They have granted their congregation a form of faith that is as simple, cheap, convenient, and functional as their work clothes. And now they seem to think that the priests, who are swimming in luxury, want to take this away from them."

traits.locale_text: « Là-bas, les prêtres prêchaient l'importance de l'unité familiale autour du travail communautaire, mais peu celle de l'ordre et de la hiérarchie. Ils ont apporté à leur congrégation une forme de foi simple, peu onéreuse, pratique et fonctionnelle, à l'image de leurs tenues de travail. Désormais, ils semblent penser que les prêtres, qui se vautrent dans le luxe, veulent la leur enlever. »

languages.text: "Die Prediger dort reden zu viel über die Bedeutung der Arbeit und die Familienbande der Gemeinschaft aller Arbeiter. Und viel zu wenig über Bedeutung von Ordnung und Hierarchie. Sie haben ihrer Gemeinde eine Form des Glaubens gestattet, die so simpel, billig, praktisch und funktionell ist wie ihre Arbeitskleidung. Und nun scheinen sie zu glauben, dass die Priester, die im Luxus schwimmen, ihnen das alles wegnehmen wollen."
languages.original_text: "The preachers there have been preaching much about the importance of work and the labour community's familial unity, but they mention very little about the importance of order and hierarchy. They have granted their congregation a form of faith that is as simple, cheap, convenient, and functional as their work clothes. And now they seem to think that the priests, who are swimming in luxury, want to take this away from them."

traits.locale_text: "Die Prediger dort reden zu viel über die Bedeutung der Arbeit und die Familienbande der Gemeinschaft aller Arbeiter. Und viel zu wenig über Bedeutung von Ordnung und Hierarchie. Sie haben ihrer Gemeinde eine Form des Glaubens gestattet, die so simpel, billig, praktisch und funktionell ist wie ihre Arbeitskleidung. Und nun scheinen sie zu glauben, dass die Priester, die im Luxus schwimmen, ihnen das alles wegnehmen wollen."
